titleStmt.title: Christos autotheos, or, An historical account of the heresie denying the Godhead of Christ
titleStmt.author: Addison, Lancelot, 1632-1703.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho. Hodgkin for Robert Clavell ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
Part of title transliterated from Greek.
Attributed to Lancelot Addison. cf. NUC pre-1956.
